name: EmailPlugin_GetEmailAddress
description: Given a name, find email address

input.description: The name of the person whose email address needs to be found.

name: EmailPlugin_SendEmail
description: Given an e-mail and message body, send an email

input.description: The body of the email message to send.

email_address.description: The email address to send email to.

number1.description: The number to take the absolute value of

name: TimePlugin_Date
description: Get the current date

name: TimePlugin_DateMatchingLastDayName
description: Get the date of the last day matching the supplied week day name in English. Example: Che giorno era 'Martedi' scorso -> dateMatchingLastDayName 'Tuesday' => Tuesday, 16 May, 2023

name: TimePlugin_Day
description: Get the current day of the month

name: TimePlugin_DayOfWeek
description: Get the current day of the week

name: TimePlugin_DaysAgo
description: Get the date offset by a provided number of days from today

input.description: The number of days to offset from today

name: TimePlugin_Hour
description: Get the current clock hour

description: Get the current clock 24-hour number

name: TimePlugin_Minute
description: Get the minutes on the current hour

name: TimePlugin_Month
description: Get the current month name

name: TimePlugin_MonthNumber
description: Get the current month number

name: TimePlugin_Now
description: Get the current date and time in the local time zone

name: TimePlugin_Second
description: Get the seconds on the current minute

name: TimePlugin_Time
description: Get the current time

name: TimePlugin_TimeZoneName
description: Get the local time zone name

name: TimePlugin_TimeZoneOffset
description: Get the local time zone offset from UTC

name: TimePlugin_Today
description: Get the current date

name: TimePlugin_UtcNow
description: Get the current UTC date and time

name: TimePlugin_Year
description: Get the current year

description: This function is used to send the final answer of a plan to the user.
